This software isn't the best out there...

It doesn't support converting from mkv

When you drag and drop more than one video, it doesnt queue them in order

You can't move videos up or down the queue to arrange them

You can't add or delete individual videos from the queue once it starts encoding. you must stop it first

CPU/Process management is horrible. When it's running, the whole system is sluggish and slow

It's as if it's poorly designed and developed...

You can;t tell when a new version comes out, because their website doesnt tell you anywhere, and when asking them for support, they have some of the dumbest most useless support i've ever seen.. It's been 1.5 years now i'm sending the same question and i only get a "sorry, we dont know" reply from them.

the videos i encode as ipod profile ALWAYS get out of sync around halfway through the episode... tried it on 2 different ipods with the same problem.

the list goes on and on....

As an alternative, i recommend iSquint.
Serial worked great. No one to seed to but i will keep it goin for sure.
